overview: During Paris Fashion Week, models, designers and industry hot shots gather to work, mingle, argue and try to seduce one another.
tagline: At the world's hottest fashion show, there's been a murder and now everyone's a suspect. If you've got something to hide, you'll need something to wear.
cast: Marcello Mastroianni|Sophia Loren|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Kim Basinger|Chiara Mastroianni
